channel.title: [HELP] Compiling Problems [HELP]
channel.description:
Okay guys, well i have some compiling problems. I need some help with this error that i keep seeming to have, if you have any idea of this error please reply. I need help with this and I'm really not sure, on whats wrong with it I've been trying to work it out for some time now. Here is my problem!
[code=java] Error occurred during initialization of VM java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
This is my code i have in the compiler, i'm not sure if it's correct or what not. Please help!
[code=java] @echo off title Compile cd Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe pause [/code]
I'm running a windows 7 operating system and 64-bit, so i think i need a compiler that will support my windows 7 64-bit.
Need help with this - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,455813.msg3337605.html#msg3337605
Thanks Guys,
All help is much appreciative

item.title: [HELP] Compiling Problems [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

I’ve used it, I’m downloading JDK but I’m still getting the same 1722 error. I’m downloading the 32-Bit version though.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Compiling Problems [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Just use the compiler I proved earlier

@echo off title compiling...... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp ./*java pause.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Opium10, post:10, topic:359329”]I’ve made that my compiler and now i’m getting this:

'"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javac.exe"' is not recognized as an inter nal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . [/quote]

I would think this is your classpath

.;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

If not, download Java from here

item.title: [HELP] Compiling Problems [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

I’m getting this error:

The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .

My Compiler Code is this:

@echo off
title My Compiler
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp ./*java
pause

This is what i have in my java folder:

This is inside my jre6 folder:

So what do i do?

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Compiling Problems [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“deleter164, post:6, topic:359329”]This is the right compiler code o.O

@echo off
:menu
title Snipers Compiler (which is ftw)
echo Errors:
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Compiling Finished.
pause
exit[/quote]

It doesn’t matter which one you use.

Either of them will work.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Compiling Problems [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @deleter164 deleter164
item.description:
@deleter164 wrote:

This is the right compiler code o.O

@echo off
:menu
title Snipers Compiler (which is ftw)
echo Errors:
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Compiling Finished.
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Compiling Problems [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

you need to have downloaded and installed a 32 bit JDK on your computer.

You can use this compiler to compile your code.

@echo off
title Compiling.......
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp ./*java
pause

Read full topic
